subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. draft affirmed teams’ interest in defensive linemen and quarterback-chasing linebackers like Courtney Upshaw who can disrupt the passing game.
snippet: The N.F.L. draft affirmed teams’ interest in defensive linemen and quarterback-chasing linebackers like Courtney Upshaw who can disrupt the passing game.
